InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/02/2025
Sharing: great that you are considering to share your dataset, please only share your data as open data if you are sure that it is fully anonymous, if data is pseudonymous, i.e. if there is still a (small) possibility that the participants could be reidentified by you or by others, you can use RDR and apply access restrictions, interested researchers will see the description of your dataset, but have to submit a request to access the files upon signing a Data Transfer Agreement. For more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
